definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

sentences.english: Tarrou, the chief fighter against the disease, is infected and dies.
sentences.chinese: 对抗疾病的先锋塔鲁却染病身亡。

sentences.english: This shows the counteracting property of network security.
sentences.chinese: 这体现了网络安全的攻防对抗本质。

sentences.english: That is because Malian government forces are fighting against rebels .
sentences.chinese: 这是因为马里政府部队正对抗叛军。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION The Tongbi capsule has inhibitory effect on acute and immune inflammation.
sentences.chinese: 通鼻胶囊具有对抗急性及免疫性炎症的作用。

sentences.english: If chemical resistance is in question, in-plant tests are suggested.
sentences.chinese: 如果对抗化学性有疑问，建议进行工厂内部测试。

sentences.english: Ore Collectors have secondary abilities that are very effective against Terror Drones.
sentences.chinese: 矿车的第二能力对抗恐怖机器人都是非常有效的。

sentences.english: But you bring only this handful of soldiers against Xerxes?
sentences.chinese: 你就带这么少士兵对抗敌军？

sentences.english: Methods To analysis 46 cases with IPPV resisted to mechanical ventilation.
sentences.chinese: 方法对46例人机对抗患者进行回顾性分析。

sentences.english: Ten years ago, his father and brother Yik Lok were attacked by the evil leopards.
sentences.chinese: 十年前其父与兄亦乐对抗魔豹时，父死于魔豹爪下。

sentences.english: The technology will allow for the first time the same active array to be used for the radar and countermeasures."It
sentences.chinese: 该技术将首次允许雷达和对抗使用同一有源阵列。

sentences.english: The Cold War was also a sporting war, with US–Soviet rivalries played out every four years.
sentences.chinese: 冷战也体现在体育对抗上，每四年演绎一场美苏对抗。

sentences.english: Chemical allopathic veterinary drugs and antibiotics is prohibited .
sentences.chinese: 禁止使用化学对抗疗法的兽药和抗生素。

sentences.english: We forced the Invid's hand at Reflex Point.
sentences.chinese: 我们在反射点对抗因维德人的部队。

sentences.english: James comes armed for the Lakers now.
sentences.chinese: 现在詹姆斯有了左膀右臂来对抗湖人。

sentences.english: Exercise is a primary weapon against cellulite.
sentences.chinese: 运动是对抗脂肪团最主要的武器。

definition: to handle/to deal with/to cope/to get by with
to resist/to make a stand and fight (against)
to pit oneself against sb/to compete with sb/contest/battle/to haggle/to quibble
